name: flint
description: Flint is a lightweight self-hosted leveled log viewer designed for distributed systems. It helps developers visualize and search logs across environments with a web UI for filtering and navigation.
features: Log Viewing: Leveled log visualization, Distributed system support, Web UI for filtering. Simplified log analysis.
Search: Find logs quickly. Powerful filtering.
Multi-Environment: Track logs across systems. Centralized viewing.
Developer-Friendly: Built for debugging. Essential dev tool.
Real-Time: Live log streaming. Instant updates.
Level Filtering: Focus on errors or warnings. Targeted analysis.
Time Range: View specific periods. Historical analysis.
Export: Download logs for analysis. Data portability.
